Alexander.Name: Alexander
Details: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Americano.Name: Americano
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into a highball glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

Angel Face.Name: Angel Face
Details: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

Aviation.Name: Aviation
Details: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

B-52.Name: B-52
Details:
Coffee liqueur
Irish cream
Orange-flavored liqueur
Layer ingredients into a shot glass.  Serve with a stirrer.

Bacardi cocktail.Name: Bacardi cocktail
Details: Shake together with ice.  Strain into glass and serve

Barracuda.Name: Barracuda
Details: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Bellini.Name: Bellini
Details: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.
Traditionally a Bellini uses white peaches for the fruit.

Between the Sheets.Name: Between the Sheets
Details: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Black Russian.Name: Black Russian
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Bloody Mary.Name: Bloody Mary
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

Bramble.Name: Bramble
Details: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

Caipirinha.Name: Caipirinha
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.
A wide variety of fresh fruits can be used in place of lime. In the absence of cachaça, vodka can be used, making a caipiroska.[1]
Greds: Half a lime cut into 4 wedges

Casino.Name: Casino
Details: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

Champagne cocktail.Name: Champagne cocktail
Details: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

Clover Club Cocktail.Name: Clover Club Cocktail
Details: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

Cosmopolitan.Name: Cosmopolitan
Details: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime slice.
The drink should be a frothy bright pink color

Cuba Libre (Rum and Coke).Name: Cuba Libre (Rum and Coke)
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Daiquiri.Name: Daiquiri
Details: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Double Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Dark 'n' Stormy.Name: Dark 'n' Stormy
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Fill glass with ice, add rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

Derby.Name: Derby
Details: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

Dry Martini.Name: Dry Martini
Details: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

Espresso Martini.Name: Espresso Martini
Details: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass
Greds: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)

French 75.Name: French 75
Details: Combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass.  Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

French Connection.Name: French Connection
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

French Martini.Name: French Martini
Details: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

Gin fizz.Name: Gin fizz
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

Golden Dream.Name: Golden Dream
Details: Shake with cracked ice.  Strain into glass and serve.

Grasshopper.Name: Grasshopper
Details:
Crème de cacao
Crème de menthe
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Harvey Wallbanger.Name: Harvey Wallbanger
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top.  Garnish and serve.

Hemingway Special.Name: Hemingway Special
Details: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

Horse's Neck.Name: Horse's Neck
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

Irish Coffee.Name: Irish Coffee
Details: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

John Collins.Name: John Collins
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
Greds: 3 cl (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice

Kamikaze.Name: Kamikaze
Details: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

Kir.Name: Kir
Details: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.
A recipe can be found at the International Bartenders Association website.

Lemon drop martini.Name: Lemon drop martini
Details: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

Long Island Iced Tea.Name: Long Island Iced Tea
Details:
Gin
Tequila
Vodka
Rum
Triple sec
On the rocks; poured over ice
Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw. [1]

Mai Tai.Name: Mai Tai
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime shell
Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

Manhattan.Name: Manhattan
Details: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Margarita.Name: Margarita
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

Mary Pickford.Name: Mary Pickford
Details: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

Mimosa.Name: Mimosa
Details: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

Mint julep.Name: Mint julep
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Mojito.Name: Mojito
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
sprig of mint (Yerba buena in the original recipe), lemon slice

Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves and lemon slice. Serve with straw.
Greds: 2 teaspoons sugar (or 2 cl of sugar syrup)

Monkey Gland.Name: Monkey Gland
Details: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Moscow mule.Name: Moscow mule
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

Negroni (cocktail).Name: Negroni (cocktail)
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Old Fashioned.Name: Old Fashioned
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice

Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water.
Muddle until dissolved. 
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. 

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

Paradise.Name: Paradise
Details: Shake together over ice.  Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

Pisco sour.Name: Pisco sour
Details: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

Piña colada.Name: Piña colada
Details: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
Alternately, the three main components can simply be added to a cocktail glass, and then add ice cubes.

Planter's Punch.Name: Planter's Punch
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

Porto Flip.Name: Porto Flip
Details: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice.  Strain into glass, garnish and serve

Ramos fizz.Name: Ramos fizz
Details:
All ingredients except the soda are poured in a mixing glass, dry shaken (no ice) for two minutes, then ice is added and shaken hard for another minute
Strained into a highball glass without ice and topped with soda

Rose.Name: Rose
Details: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass.  Garnish and serve.

Russian Spring Punch.Name: Russian Spring Punch
Details: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Rusty Nail.Name: Rusty Nail
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve.

Sazerac.Name: Sazerac
Details:
Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. 
Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. 

Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.[1]
Note: The original recipe changed in the latter part of the 19th century. Rye whiskey was substituted when cognac became difficult to obtain.[2]

Screwdriver.Name: Screwdriver
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

Sea Breeze.Name: Sea Breeze
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Sex on the Beach.Name: Sex on the Beach
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

Sidecar.Name: Sidecar
Details: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

Singapore Sling.Name: Singapore Sling
Details: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

Sloe gin fizz.Name: Sloe gin fizz
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice

Spritz Veneziano.Name: Spritz Veneziano
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Stinger.Name: Stinger
Details: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass.  May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

It has been suggested that during the 1920s the Stinger ceased being an after-dinner cocktail, and instead should be consumed before dinner.[1] However, the IBA continues to list the Stinger as an after-dinner cocktail.[2]

Tequila Sunrise.Name: Tequila Sunrise
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.

The Godfather.Name: The Godfather
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

The Godmother.Name: The Godmother
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Tommy's Margarita.Name: Tommy's Margarita
Details: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Tuxedo.Name: Tuxedo
Details: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

Vampiro.Name: Vampiro
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Salt on the rim. Chili pepper (optional)
Pour ingredients into glass rimmed with salt. Stir.
Greds: Few slices fresh red hot chili pepper

Vesper.Name: Vesper
Details: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the garnish.

Whiskey sour.Name: Whiskey sour
Details: On the rocks; poured over ice
Maraschino cherry and half orange slice
Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

White Lady.Name: White Lady
Details: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.
This cocktail is a variant of the Sidecar

Yellow Bird.Name: Yellow Bird
Details: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
